title: Technical Sales Engineer - Textiles Division
description: Drive B2B sales of protective glove solutions across Middle East and Africa. Work with industrial clients to specify appropriate PPE for their applications.
responsibilities: Develop and maintain relationships with key accounts in oil & gas, manufacturing, and construction sectors
Conduct technical presentations and product demonstrations
Collaborate with safety managers to assess hand protection needs
Prepare proposals, quotations, and tender responses
Achieve quarterly and annual sales targets
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Industrial Safety, or related field
3+ years B2B technical sales experience, preferably in PPE or industrial products
Strong understanding of safety standards (ANSI, EN388, ISO)
Excellent communication skills in English; Arabic is a plus
Willingness to travel up to 50%

title: Product Engineer - Engine Machinery
description: Lead development and improvement of precision engine tooling and test equipment. Collaborate with manufacturing and quality teams to ensure product excellence.
responsibilities: Design and develop new engine service equipment and tooling
Conduct product testing, validation, and certification
Create technical documentation, user manuals, and training materials
Support customers with technical troubleshooting and applications engineering
Work with suppliers to optimize component quality and cost
requirements: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Mechanical Engineering or Automotive Engineering
5+ years experience in automotive tooling, engine development, or related field
Proficiency in CAD software (SolidWorks, CATIA) and FEA analysis
Knowledge of ISO 9001 and automotive quality standards (IATF 16949)
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail

title: Quality Assurance Manager
description: Oversee quality management systems across manufacturing facilities. Lead ISO certification efforts and continuous improvement initiatives.
responsibilities: Manage quality assurance team and establish quality policies
Maintain ISO 9001 certification and pursue additional certifications (ISO 13485, AS9100)
Conduct internal audits, supplier audits, and corrective action follow-up
Analyze quality metrics and drive root cause analysis for nonconformances
Interface with customers on quality matters and audit preparation
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Quality Management, or related field; advanced degree preferred
8+ years in quality management, with 3+ years in leadership role
ISO 9001 Lead Auditor certification required; Six Sigma Black Belt preferred
Experience in both textile and mechanical manufacturing industries is a plus
Strong knowledge of statistical process control and quality tools

title: Regional Supply Chain Coordinator - Americas
description: Manage supply chain operations for North and South America. Optimize inventory, coordinate shipments, and ensure on-time delivery to customers.
responsibilities: Oversee regional warehousing and distribution operations
Manage inventory levels to balance availability and carrying costs
Coordinate international shipments and customs clearance
Develop relationships with freight forwarders and logistics partners
Implement supply chain improvements and cost reduction initiatives
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Supply Chain Management, Logistics, or Business
4+ years experience in international supply chain or logistics
Familiarity with ERP systems (SAP, Oracle) and supply chain software
Knowledge of import/export regulations and Incoterms
Bilingual (English/Spanish) preferred

title: Digital Marketing Specialist - B2B
description: Drive digital marketing strategy for B2B industrial markets. Manage website, content marketing, SEO/SEM, and lead generation campaigns.
responsibilities: Develop and execute digital marketing campaigns across multiple channels
Manage company website, product pages, and technical content library
Optimize SEO and SEM for industrial keywords and buyer personas
Create case studies, white papers, and technical blog content
Analyze campaign performance and provide actionable insights
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field
3+ years B2B digital marketing experience, preferably in industrial sector
Proficiency in Google Analytics, Google Ads, LinkedIn Campaign Manager
Strong content creation skills with technical writing ability
Experience with marketing automation platforms (HubSpot, Marketo)

title: Health & Safety Compliance Specialist
description: Ensure product compliance with global safety standards and regulations. Manage certification processes and maintain regulatory documentation.
responsibilities: Monitor changes in PPE and machinery safety regulations (EU, US, Asia)
Manage product testing and certification with notified bodies
Prepare technical files and declarations of conformity
Support product development with regulatory guidance
Conduct compliance training for sales and engineering teams
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Occupational Health & Safety, Engineering, or related field
4+ years experience in regulatory compliance for PPE or machinery
Deep knowledge of EN standards (EN388, EN407, EN420) and EU Machinery Directive
Experience with CE marking, UKCA, and other conformity assessment schemes
Fluent in English and German; additional European languages a plus
